      • setSesion

        public boolean setSesion(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String date,
                double basal_sistolica,
                double basal_diastolica,
                double calories,
                double average_speed,
                double total_distance,
                java.lang.String total_time)
        Insert a user's session in the Database
        Parameters:
        name - user's name
        date - user's date when begun the session
        basal_sistolica - systolic blood pressure
        basal_diastolica - diastolic pressure
        calories - calories burned during the session
        average_speed - average velocity in the session
        total_distance - total distance in the session
        total_time - total time in the session
        Returns:
        isInsert if this transaction was successful

        GPS_height - height above sea level
        partial_speed - partial velocity in the gps
        partial_distance - partial distance in the gps
        partial_time - partial time in the gps

        isInsert if this transaction was successful
